from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from mqtt import *
from mecanum import *
import time
from yolobit import *
import machine
from i2c_motors_driver import DCMotor
from ble import *

driver = DCMotor(machine.SoftI2C(scl=machine.Pin(22), sda=machine.Pin(21), freq=100000))

# Mô tả hàm này...
def line_detect_turn_left2():
  global x, AI_result, y, AIresult, verticalArmValue, horizontalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  while not ((mecanum.read_line_sensors(1)) or (mecanum.read_line_sensors(2)) or (mecanum.read_line_sensors(3)) or (mecanum.read_line_sensors(4))):
    spin_left(20)
    time.sleep_ms(30)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  while not (mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (0, 0, 0, 0)):
    display.set_all('#0000ff')
    spin_left(20)
    time.sleep_ms(30)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  while not ((mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (1, 1, 0, 0)) or (mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (1, 0, 0, 0)) or (mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (0, 0, 0, 1)) or (mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (0, 0, 1, 1))):
    spin_left(20)
    time.sleep_ms(30)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  display.set_all('#ffa500')
  spin_left(20)
  time.sleep_ms(30)
  driver.setSpeed(0,0)
  driver.setSpeed(1,0)
  driver.setSpeed(2,0)
  driver.setSpeed(3,0)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def line_detect():
  global x, AI_result, y, AIresult, verticalArmValue, horizontalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  while not (mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (1, 1, 1, 1)):
    front_line_detect()
  go_straight(25)
  time.sleep_ms(100)
  driver.setSpeed(0,0)
  driver.setSpeed(1,0)
  driver.setSpeed(2,0)
  driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  time.sleep_ms(250)
  line_detect_turn_right2()

# Mô tả hàm này...
def turn_right(x):
  global AI_result, y, AIresult, verticalArmValue, horizontalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  driver.setSpeed(0,0)
  driver.setSpeed(1,x)
  driver.setSpeed(2,x)
  driver.setSpeed(3,0)

  driver.setSpeed(1,y)
  driver.setSpeed(2,0)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def front_line_detect():
  global x, AI_result, y, AIresult, verticalArmValue, horizontalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  if mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (1, 0, 0, 0):
    display.set_all('#ff0000')
    turn_left(30)
    time.sleep_ms(35)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  elif mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (1, 1, 0, 0):
    display.set_all('#ffa500')
    turn_left(30)
    time.sleep_ms(30)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  elif mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (0, 0, 0, 1):
    display.set_all('#ffff00')
    turn_right(35)
    time.sleep_ms(35)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  elif mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (0, 0, 1, 1):
    display.set_all('#00ff00')
    turn_right(35)
    time.sleep_ms(30)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  elif mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (0, 0, 0, 0):
    display.set_all('#0000ff')
    white_detected()
  elif mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (1, 1, 0, 1):
    display.set_all('#4b0082')
    spin_left(40)
    time.sleep_ms(50)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  elif mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (1, 0, 1, 1):
    display.set_all('#800080')
    spin_right(40)
    time.sleep_ms(50)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  elif mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (1, 1, 1, 0):
    display.set_all('#ffffff')
    spin_right(40)
    time.sleep_ms(50)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  elif mecanum.read_line_sensors() == (0, 1, 1, 1):
    display.set_all('#000000')
    spin_left(40)
    time.sleep_ms(50)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  else:
    go_straight(25)
    time.sleep_ms(30)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)

def on_ble_message_string_receive_callback(AI_result):
  global x, y, AIresult, verticalArmValue, horizontalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  if AI_result == ('!B516'):
    go_straight(50)
  elif AI_result == ('!B615'):
    go_back(50)
  elif AI_result == ('!B714'):
    spin_left(50)
  elif AI_result == ('!B814'):
    spin_right(50)
  elif AI_result == ('!B11:'):
    turn_left(30)
  elif AI_result == ('!B219'):
    turn_right(30)
  elif AI_result == ('!B318'):
    turn_left2(30)
  elif AI_result == ('!B417'):
    turn_right2(30)
  else:
    pass

ble.on_receive_msg("string", on_ble_message_string_receive_callback)

# Mô tả hàm này...
def back_line_detect():
  global x, AI_result, y, AIresult, verticalArmValue, horizontalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  if pin16.read_digital() == 0 and pin12.read_digital() == 1:
    driver.setSpeed(0,(-50))
    driver.setSpeed(1,(-50))
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
    time.sleep_ms(50)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  elif pin12.read_digital() == 0 and pin16.read_digital() == 1:
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,(-50))
    driver.setSpeed(3,(-50))
    time.sleep_ms(50)
    driver.setSpeed(0,0)
    driver.setSpeed(1,0)
    driver.setSpeed(2,0)
    driver.setSpeed(3,0)
  else:
    driver.setSpeed(0,(-40))
    driver.setSpeed(1,(-40))
    driver.setSpeed(2,(-40))
    driver.setSpeed(3,(-40))

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__aicamera_(AIresult):
  global x, AI_result, y, verticalArmValue, horizontalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  display.set_all('#ffff00')
  if AIresult == '0':
    display.show(Image("00100:01010:01010:01010:00100"))
  elif AIresult == '1':
    display.show(Image("00100:01100:00100:00100:01110"))
  elif AIresult == '2':
    display.show(Image("01110:00010:00100:01000:01110"))
  elif AIresult == '3':
    display.show(Image("01110:00010:01110:00010:01110"))
  elif AIresult == '4':
    display.show(Image("01010:01010:01110:00010:00010"))

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__vertical_arm_(verticalArmValue):
  global x, AI_result, y, AIresult, horizontalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  display.show(Image.HEART)
  arm_up(90 - (int(verticalArmValue)))

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__horizontal_arm_(horizontalArmValue):
  global x, AI_result, y, AIresult, verticalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  display.show(Image.HEART)
  open_arm(90 - (int(horizontalArmValue)))

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__mecanum_behavior_(mecanumBehavior):
  global x, AI_result, y, AIresult, verticalArmValue, horizontalArmValue, automatic
  display.set_all('#ffff00')
  if automatic == 0:
    if mecanumBehavior == 'left':
      display.show(Image("00100:01000:11111:01000:00100"))
      spin_left(30)
      time.sleep_ms(300)
    elif mecanumBehavior == 'right':
      display.show(Image("00100:00010:11111:00010:00100"))
      spin_right(30)
      time.sleep_ms(300)
    elif mecanumBehavior == 'up':
      go_straight(30)
      display.show(Image("00100:01110:10101:00100:00100"))
      time.sleep_ms(300)
    elif mecanumBehavior == 'down':
      go_back(30)
      display.show(Image("00100:00100:10101:01110:00100"))
      time.sleep_ms(300)
    elif mecanumBehavior == 'auto':
      automatic = 1
  else:
    if mecanumBehavior == 'auto_stop':
      automatic = 0

# Mô tả hàm này...
def app_control():
  global x, AI_result, y, AIresult, verticalArmValue, horizontalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  mqtt.on_receive_message('aicamera', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__aicamera_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('vertical-arm', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__vertical_arm_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('horizontal-arm', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__horizontal_arm_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('mecanum-behavior', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__mecanum_behavior_)
  if automatic == 1:
    line_detect()

# Mô tả hàm này...
def white_detected():
  global x, AI_result, y, AIresult, verticalArmValue, horizontalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  while not ((mecanum.read_line_sensors(1)) or (mecanum.read_line_sensors(2)) or (mecanum.read_line_sensors(3)) or (mecanum.read_line_sensors(4))):
    spin_right(30)
    time.sleep_ms(30)

def on_ble_message_string_receive_callback(AI_result):
  global x, y, AIresult, verticalArmValue, horizontalArmValue, automatic, mecanumBehavior
  if AI_result == ('!B516'):
    go_straight(50)
  elif AI_result == ('!B615'):
    go_back(50)
  elif AI_result == ('!B714'):
    spin_left(50)
  elif AI_result == ('!B814'):
    spin_right(50)
  elif AI_result == ('!B11:'):
    turn_left(30)
  elif AI_result == ('!B219'):
    turn_right(30)
  elif AI_result == ('!B318'):
    turn_left2(30)
  elif AI_result == ('!B417'):
    turn_right2(30)
  else:
    pass

ble.on_receive_msg("string", on_ble_message_string_receive_callback)

if True:
  display.set_all('#ffff00')
  mqtt.connect_wifi('ESP32', '12345678')
  mqtt.connect_broker(server='192.168.4.3', port=1883, username='', password='')
  automatic = 0

while True:
  line_detect()


display.set_pixel(4, 2, '#ff0000')

display.set_pixel(0, 2, '#ff0000')

display.set_pixel(2, 4, '#ff0000')

display.set_pixel(2, 0, '#ff0000')

display.set_all('#ffff00')
